name: Ruh and the Rejuvenation Spa
description:
Come visit the Rejuvenation Spa and get some much needed respite. If only it was that easy.

Ruh & the Rejuvenation Spa is a short puzzle game with light action-adventure elements.

Features:

  • Original Graphics
  • Original 10-song soundtrack
  • Puzzles at your leisure.
  • Puzzles under pressure.
  • A story about dealing with blocks (with some help from an eclectic cast of characters).
